glsa.title: OpenTTD: Remote Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: The OpenTTD server is vulnerable to a remote Denial of Service.

background.p: OpenTTD is a clone of Transport Tycoon Deluxe.

description.p: OpenTTD is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack due to a flaw in the manner the game server handles errors in command packets.

impact.p: An authenticated attacker can cause a Denial of Service by sending an invalid error number to a vulnerable OpenTTD server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenTTD users should upgrade to the latest version:
